publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-414# Michael Russell: Irvine Elderly Forum—That the Parliament congratulates Irvine Elderly Forum on its work to highlight the many difficulties faced by Scotland’s pensioners and supports its campaign for a decent pensioner income following the insulting 75 pence a week increase in the state pension announced recently by Her Majesty’s Government. Supported by: Kay Ullrich*
S1M-414# Irvine Elderly Forum (lodged on 12 January 2000) Richard Lochhead*, Fergus Ewing*

S1M-414# Michael Russell: Irvine Elderly Forum—That the Parliament congratulates Irvine Elderly Forum on its work to highlight the many difficulties faced by Scotland’s pensioners and supports its campaign for a decent pensioner income following the insulting 75 pence a week increase in the state pension announced recently by Her Majesty’s Government. Supported by: Kay Ullrich, Richard Lochhead, Fergus Ewing
S1M-414# Irvine Elderly Forum (lodged on 12 January 2000) Alasdair Morgan*
S1M-414# Irvine Elderly Forum (lodged on 12 January 2000) Alex Neil*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-414# Irvine Elderly Forum (lodged on 12 January 2000) Donald Gorrie*

Supported by: Kay Ullrich, Richard Lochhead, Fergus Ewing, Alasdair Morgan, Alex Neil, Mr Adam Ingram, Donald Gorrie
